definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: push, thrust, gore (NH id.; Ar. najah.a succeed, attain, make progress; Targum as BH);—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יְנַגַּח]] De 33:17; 2 ms [[תְּנַגַּח]] 1Ki 22:11, 2Ch 18:10; [[תְּנַגְּחוּ]] Ez Eze 34:21; [[נְנַגֵּחַ]] Ps 44:6; Pt. [[מְנַגֵּחַ]] Da 8:4; —; push or thrust at, sq. acc.: of Joseph under fig. of wild ox De 33:17, cf. 1Ki 22:11 = 2Ch 18:10, Ps 44:6 (‖[[בּוּס]]); v. also Ez Eze 34:21 (of Isr. under fig. of sheep), cf. Da 8:4 (of ram in vision; obj. not expr.).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִתְנַגַּח עִמּוֹ מֶלֶךְ הַנֶּגֶב]] Da 11:40 engage in thrusting with, wage war with.
